name: MythScape
description:
MythScape is a 2D role-playing video game. You play as Rumi, the main character, who is on a journey with her sister, Misa, to explore the different worlds through the portals, solve different kinds of puzzles and fight various enemies.

The game is heavily inspired by Undertale and Touhou Project.


PLOT

Two sisters ended up entering a mysterious portal that transported them to an unknown cave. They somehow gained powers and have to fight various monsters in order to escape. Will they ever get back home?


NOTE

This game is for my University project. The game only has one chapter for now and I'm still contemplating whether to continue the game or not.
